subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|牛|寺|c1=s|c2=p|t1=ox|ls=psc}} – large male ox.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Compare {{cog|th|ถึก||young ox, male water buffalo}}, {{cog|lo|ເຖິກ||male (of animal)}}, {{cog|mkh-vie-pro|*dək||male}} > {{cog|vi|đực||male (of animal); bull}}.

Related to {{och-l|犆|male animal}}.
